casebody.data:
CARL and Eilber
v.
STATE OF NC. No. 432P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Donald H. Beskind, Raleigh, J. Martin Futrell, for Carl and Eilber. David Dreifus, Edwin M. Speas, Thomas K. Lindgren, Raleigh, for MedAmerica Ins. Co.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of September 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
